content: About three thousand people died in this country on the morning of September 11, 2001 due to a coordination of multiple terrorist attacks. This led to us going to war in two countries. That was three thousand. Getting rid of the ACA would cost almost six times as many lives in the first year (and grow each year thereafter), and this is just fine with Republicans. I guess when jihadist extremists kill Americans this is cause for war, but when Republicans kill Americans this is just okey-dokey fine and dandy?
